verses.verse: These are the journeys <S%H4550><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when they went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by their hosts <S%H6635><s%> under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> their goings out <S%H4161><s%> according to their journeys <S%H4550><s%> by the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and these are their journeys <S%H4550><s%> according to their goings out <S%H4161><s%>.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses <S%H7486><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the fifteenth <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>; on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> after the passover <S%H6453><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> with a high <S%H7311><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>,

while the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> were burying <S%H6912><s%> all their first-born <S%H1060><s%>, whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had smitten <S%H5221><s%> among them <S%H430><s%>: upon their gods also Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses <S%H7486><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Succoth <S%H5523><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Succoth <S%H5523><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Etham <S%H864><s%>, which is in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Etham <S%H864><s%>, and turned back <S%H7725><s%> unto Pi-hahiroth <S%H6367><s%>, which is before Baal-zephon <S%H1189><s%>: and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Migdol <S%H4024><s%>.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Hahiroth <S%H5265><s%>, and passed through <S%H5674><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: and they went <S%H3212><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey <S%H1870><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Etham <S%H864><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Marah <S%H4785><s%>.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Marah <S%H4785><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> unto Elim <S%H362><s%>: and in Elim <S%H362><s%> were twelve <S%H8147><s%> springs <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, and threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> palm-trees <S%H8558><s%>; and they encamped there <S%H2583><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Elim <S%H362><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin <S%H5512><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin <S%H5512><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Dophkah <S%H1850><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Dophkah <S%H1850><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Alush <S%H442><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Alush <S%H442><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Rephidim <S%H7508><s%>, where was no water <S%H4325><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rephidim <S%H7508><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Kibroth-hattaavah <S%H6914><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Kibroth-hattaavah <S%H6914><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Hazeroth <S%H2698><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Hazeroth <S%H2698><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Rithmah <S%H7575><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rithmah <S%H7575><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Rimmon-perez <S%H7428><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rimmon-perez <S%H7428><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Libnah <S%H3841><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Libnah <S%H3841><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Rissah <S%H7446><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rissah <S%H7446><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Kehelathah <S%H6954><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Kehelathah <S%H6954><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Shepher <S%H8234><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Shepher <S%H8234><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Haradah <S%H2732><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Haradah <S%H2732><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Makheloth <S%H4722><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Makheloth <S%H4722><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Tahath <S%H8480><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Tahath <S%H8480><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Terah <S%H8646><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Terah <S%H8646><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Mithkah <S%H4989><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Mithkah <S%H4989><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Hashmonah <S%H2832><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Hashmonah <S%H2832><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Moseroth <S%H4149><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Moseroth <S%H4149><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Bene-jaakan <S%H1142><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Bene-jaakan <S%H1142><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Hor-haggidgad <S%H2735><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Hor-haggidgad <S%H2735><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Jotbathah <S%H3193><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Jotbathah <S%H3193><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Abronah <S%H5684><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Abronah <S%H5684><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Ezion-geber <S%H6100><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Ezion-geber <S%H6100><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> (the same is Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>).

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>, in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> into mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> at the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%> there <S%H705><s%>, in the fortieth year <S%H8141><s%> after the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were come out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the first day of the month <S%H259><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> was a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he died <S%H4194><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>.

And the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Arad <S%H6166><s%>, who dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the South <S%H5045><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> of the coming <S%H935><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Zalmonah <S%H6758><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Zalmonah <S%H6758><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Punon <S%H6325><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Punon <S%H6325><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Oboth <S%H88><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Oboth <S%H88><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Iye-abarim <S%H5863><s%>, in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Iyim <S%H5864><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Dibon-gad <S%H1769><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Dibon-gad <S%H1769><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Almon-diblathaim <S%H5963><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Almon-diblathaim <S%H5963><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim <S%H5682><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> Nebo <S%H5015><s%>.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim <S%H5682><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.
And they encamped <S%H2583><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, from Beth-jeshimoth <S%H1020><s%> even unto Abel-shittim <S%H63><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H5674><s%>, When ye pass over the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>,

then ye shall drive out <S%H3423><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H6><s%>, and destroy all their figured <S%H4906><s%> stones <S%H6><s%>, and destroy all their molten <S%H4541><s%> images <S%H6754><s%>, and demolish <S%H8045><s%> all their high places <S%H1116><s%>:
and ye shall take possession <S%H3423><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein <S%H5414><s%>; for unto you have I given the land <S%H776><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

And ye shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> according to your families <S%H4940><s%>; to the more <S%H7227><s%> ye shall give the more <S%H7227><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and to the fewer <S%H4592><s%> thou shalt give the less <S%H4591><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: wheresoever the lot <S%H1486><s%> falleth <S%H3318><s%> to any man <S%H4294><s%>, that shall be his; according to the tribes of your fathers <S%H1><s%> shall ye inherit <S%H5157><s%>.

But if ye will not drive out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3498><s%>, then shall those that ye let remain of them be as pricks <S%H7899><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and as thorns <S%H6796><s%> in your sides <S%H6654><s%>, and they shall vex <S%H6887><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> wherein ye dwell <S%H3427><s%>.
And it shall come to pass <S%H1819><s%>, that, as I thought to do <S%H6213><s%> unto them <S%H6213><s%>, so will I do unto you.
